content:
DINE, DRINK,
AND NEVER
LEAVE THE
GROUNDS

While it's surrounded by the non-stop South Beach nightlife scene, the grounds of Washington Park Hotel are both an oasis of repose and a scene unto themselves. With our courtyard bar, pool deck, gardens and soon-to-be-opened Employees Only restaurant, we'd suggest spending at least one of your nights in South Beach not going anywhere at all.
